title: U.S. Physical Activity IG
introduction: Defines U.S. interoperability expectations related to physical activity, including primary assessment, supporting measures, plans, goals, referrals and patient-engagement.  Supports interoperability between care managers (e.g. EHRs, community health systems, etc.), service providers (physical activity professionals including exercise physiologists, personal trainers, community fitness centers, etc.), as well as patient-facing applications.
